1k data.from sentence: In 1k data, QRN's '2r' (2 layers + reset gate + d = 50) outperforms all other models by a large margin (2.8+%).

10k dataset.from sentence: In 10k dataset, the average accuracy of QRN's '6r200' (6 layers + reset gate + d = 200) model outperforms all previous models by a large margin (2.5+%), achieving a nearly perfect score of 99.7%.

Dialog.from sentence: QRN outperforms previous work by a large margin (2.0+%) in every comparison.
